intro: Knoxia teres, commonly known as the knobbed knoxia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its small, fleshy leaves and vibrant, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow and orange. Knoxia teres thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, adapting to harsh conditions with its succulent structure. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
